rooms.name: North-facing Entrance & Lobby
rooms.description: The main entrance is aligned with the North for positive energy flow. It doubles as a foyer that connects to both living areas and private gym.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Living & Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan design combining the living room, dining area, and modern kitchen. Natural light is enhanced through north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Dining Space
rooms.description: Integrated within the open-plan living area; promotes communal family gatherings.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated space for fitness, fitted with eco-friendly equipment and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Studio Area (Master Bedroom & Study)
rooms.description: Multi-functional room that can serve as a master bedroom and workspace, following Vastu for relaxation.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented to the North for optimal energy flow.
Large windows in the living area to enhance natural light and maintain an eco-friendly interior.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A green roof terrace that serves as a relaxation space, with eco-friendly landscaping and rainwater harvesting integration.

openings.description: Access to the rooftop terrace from the ground floor using a Vastu-compliant staircase design.
